channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024120386
item.description:
Report X-2024120386

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-29
  • City: ABERDEEN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THREE AIR PACKAGES COLD TO THE TOUCH WERE INSPECTED PRIOR TO AIR TRANSPORT. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED EACH BOX CONTAINS APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO VARIOUS CONSIGNEES IN THE USA ARE 1ZX1V7854497140684 AND 1ZX1V7850197668669. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024120133
item.description:
Report X-2024120133

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-04T12:24:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-26
  • City: ABERDEEN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THREE AIR PACKAGES WERE INSPECTED DUE TO THE SOUND OF DRY ICE PELLETS ROLLING AROUND IN THE BOXES. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED EACH PACKAGE CONTAINS APPROXIMATELY THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING CHEESE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. OUTER BOXES ARE THERMO CHILL INSULATED SHIPPER PACKAGES PREPRINTED PERISHABLE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO THE SAME CONSIGNEE IS 1Z096P9X0164643560 AND 1Z096R9X0164662861. THESE PACKAGES HAVE NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 096R9X, THE UPS STORE, 1013 BEARDS HILL RD 101-M, ABERDEEN MD 21001-2295.
